input: Perhaps the most important formula in probability.
translatedText: Mungkin rumus probabilitas yang paling penting.
Membantu mendanai proyek masa depan: https://www.patreon.com/3blue1 brown

input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.
translatedText: Bentuk dukungan yang sama berharganya adalah dengan membagikan beberapa video.

input: Special thanks to these supporters: http://3b1b.co/bayes-thanks
translatedText: Terima kasih khusus kepada para pendukung ini: http://3b1b.co/bayes-thanks

input: Interactive made by Reddit user Thoggalluth: https://nskobelevs.github.io/p5js/BayesTheorem/
translatedText: Interaktif dibuat oleh pengguna Reddit Thoggalluth: https://nskobelevs.github.io/p5js/BayesTheorem/

input: You can read more about Kahneman and Tversky's work in Thinking Fast and Slow, or in one of my favorite books, The Undoing Project.
translatedText: Anda dapat membaca lebih lanjut tentang karya Kahneman dan Tversky di Thinking Fast and Slow, atau di salah satu buku favorit saya, The Undoing Project.
